00051 void CTxtMsgAckDlg::DoDataExchange
00052     (
00053     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00054     )
00055 {
00056     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00057     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGACK_TXT_MSG_ID, mMessageId );
00058     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGACK_TXT_RESPONSE, mResponseText );
00059 }

00061 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 BOOL CTxtMsgAckDlg::OnInitDialog()
00069 {
00070     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00071 
00072     TCHAR  stringBuffer[50];
00073 
00074     mMessageId.Format( _T("                %s"), mAckEvent.message_id.toCString( mCom.mClientCodepage ) );
00075 
00076     MultiByteToWideChar( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mAckEvent.ack_text, -1, stringBuffer, 50 );
00077     stringBuffer[49] = '\0';
00078     mResponseText.Format( _T("     %s"), stringBuffer );
00079 
00080     UpdateData( FALSE );
00081 
00082     return TRUE;
00083 }    /* OnInitDialog() */
